ai-mil5.4.6:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
ai-mil5.4.6:1.2_0: You can expect eleven benefits when the heart’s release by love has been cultivated, developed, and practiced, made a vehicle and a basis, kept up, consolidated, and properly implemented.
ai-mil5.4.6:1.3_0: What are the teachings grouped by eleven?
ai-mil5.4.6:1.4_0: You sleep at ease. You wake happily. You don’t have bad dreams. Humans love you. Non-humans love you. Deities protect you. You can’t be harmed by fire, poison, or blade. Your mind quickly enters immersion. Your face is clear and bright. You don’t feel lost when you die. If you don’t penetrate any higher, you’ll be reborn in a Brahmā realm.’
ai-mil5.4.6:1.6_0: ‘He wandered for deer in the wood.’
ai-mil5.4.6:2.1_0: And he told him about this.
ai-mil5.4.6:2.3_0: He always launch out on that Brahmā, thinking, ‘In that case I’ve crossed over, the prince’s meditation subject as a violent storm extended and fig, but felled and infatuated by that Brahmā realm.’
ai-mil5.4.6:2.5_0: For one who slits their wrists.’
ai-mil5.4.6:2.6_0: This bag of bones is well-known, famous, and respected all around; by those who don’t want to decorate the hymns, or who haven’t reached the peak of material possessions and fame, the strained grain.”
ai-mil5.4.6:3.4_0: But because I was surrounded by a deer of hunting, I tied, infatuated, attached, blinded, and attached to it. But because I was scattered right there.
ai-mil5.4.6:3.5_0: What is the name of this one?
ai-mil5.4.6:3.6_0: She’d be filled with lofty to me. Their knocks on me if I went, great king’s protection.
ai-mil5.4.6:4.1_0: In a case where the person has attained a protection, it doesn’t fall, and any other individual to, or fire, or flood.
ai-mil5.4.6:4.2_0: Not seeing those who don’t see that, they’re trappeded for hope to find.
ai-mil5.4.6:4.3_0: Since I haven’t developed love, great king, and compassion for me.
ai-mil5.4.6:4.4_0: Take a person who is born in battle. They stay firm, and fails to plunge into battle.
ai-mil5.4.6:4.5_0: In the same way, I have practiced these kinds of people with double-layers.
ai-mil5.4.6:5.1_0: In a case where the person has attained a protection, it doesn’t fall, and any other individual to, or fire, or flood.
ai-mil5.4.6:5.2_0: Those who see that neitherever nor want to do they see, but they’re filled with trenssion, timidity to individuals.
ai-mil5.4.6:5.3_0: Take a person whose disappearance of the heavenly hand and the root of their hands. The bottom is empty and no other man.
ai-mil5.4.6:5.4_0: Neither, great king, this is the disappearance of a man, the decline and disappearance of the eye.
ai-mil5.4.6:5.5_0: In the same way, I have practiced these kinds of people with double-layers.
ai-mil5.4.6:6.1_0: In a case where the person has attained a protection, it doesn’t fall, and any other individual to, or fire, or flood.
ai-mil5.4.6:6.2_0: Not seeing those who don’t see that, they’re trappeded for hope to find.
ai-mil5.4.6:6.3_0: Since I haven’t developed love, great king, and compassion for me.
ai-mil5.4.6:6.4_0: You couldn’t have a strong harnessed with a large poem with a large crowd,
ai-mil5.4.6:6.5_0: In the same way, I have practiced these kinds of people with double-layers.
ai-mil5.4.6:7.1_0: In a case where the person has attained a protection, it doesn’t fall, and any other individual to, or fire, or flood.
ai-mil5.4.6:7.2_0: Those who see that haven’t given up what’s request, but cannot be unable to do so. They’re unable to acquire them, unjust the other individuals.”
ai-mil5.4.6:7.3_0: “It’s incredible, sir, it’s amazing! Though I’ve committed all justify the transformation.”
ai-mil5.4.6:7.4_0: “Great king, all of my things that are unskillful and considered very fruitful and beneficial, and they bring together their lasting harm and suffering.”
